title: Administrator
jobDescription:
Careers -  Administrator -  ICEBERG Networks We are looking for a reliable Office Administrator. They will undertake administrative tasks,  ensuring the rest of the staff has adequate support to work efficiently. The tasks of the office administrator will include bookkeeping and mentoring office assistants. The ideal candidate will be competent in prioritizing and working with little supervision. They will be self- motivated and trustworthy. The office administrator ensures smooth running of our companys offices and contributes in driving sustainable growth.
Role/  Responsibilities:  
 Coordinate office activities and operations to secure efficiency and compliance to company policies 
 Supervise administrative staff and divide responsibilities to ensure performance 
 Manage agendas/ travel arrangements/ appointments etc. for the upper management 
 Manage phone calls and correspondence (e- mail,  letters,  packages etc.) 
 Support budgeting and bookkeeping procedures 
 Create and update records and databases with personnel,  financial and other data 
 Track stocks of office supplies and place orders when necessary 
 Submit timely reports and prepare presentations/ proposals as assigned 
 Assist colleagues whenever necessary

title: Sr. Engineer / Engineer :  Manufacturing @ Mumbai , US MNC
jobDescription:
US MNC : Sr. Engineer / Engineer (Manufacturing) @ Mumbai / Navi Mumbai

Our US client offers miniature motor technologies to solve the motion needs of a spectrum of end markets, from medical devices to various industrial applications. They serve customers through a breadth of innovative product technologies encompassing Motors & Stepper Linear Actuators to optimize application performance.

They are part of the leading group , which is a leading, global manufacturer of Motion Control Solutions, Climate Solutions, Commercial Systems, & Industrial Systems.

Current headcount exceeds 29k+ associates

Department: Manufacturing

Reports to: Manager Manufacturing

Position Summary:

  • This position will be responsible for performing a wide variety of complex duties such as implementing & maintaining manufacturing operation sequences, specifications & equipments, requirements for production/ assembly of new & existing products.
  • Manufacturing Engineer will primarily focus on supporting production by implementing & improving manufacturing processes to achieve maximum production improvements, in cycle time, waste reduction, defect reduction & productivity.

Education & Experience:

  • Diploma (with 5+ Years) / Bachelor’s (with 3+ Years) in Mechanical/ Production with minimum 2-3 Years of experience in Manufacturing
  • Shop Floor experience in Mass Manufacturing / Assembly of functional products

Essential Duties & Responsibilities:

  • Management of shift supervision & achieving hourly target.
  • Should have handled Manufacturing production assembly process of High/Medium Volume & High Mix business.
  • Problem Solving & Trouble shooting manufacturing problems by using Systemic tools.
  • Providing guidance to the operators & training them on the job.
  • Effective utilization of resources & OEE analysis.
  • Should be Aware & following ISO procedures as required & maintain & sustain ISO

documentation

  • Kit Arrangement for next shift in coordination with planner & Store
  • Shift-wise clearance of scrap (RCCM with Correct Root Cause)
  • Daily updating of Visual management boards – Safety, Quality, Delivery, Inventory, and Productivity (SQDIP)
  • Monthly/Weekly scrap analysis & actions to be identified along with Process Quality.
  • Knowledge on Lean manufacturing systems (5S implementation, Standard work, Line balancing, SPC, FMEA’s).
  • To report Accident/Incident / unsafe condition / unsafe act to safety manager & ensure the closure
  • Build plan analysis & manpower planning (daily, weekly, monthly)

Functional Competencies:

  • Ability to work in a collaborative team environment & be responsive to production’s needs.
  • Good PC skills (MS- Office & Internet)

Personal Trait/Profile:

  • Excellent communication skills – written & spoken as job requires extensive communication.
  • Ability to take full ownership & should take initiative in resolving collection related issues
  • Alertness & high sense of urgency to resolve issues & communicate feedback to customers.

Language Skills:

  • Fluency in oral & written English communication.

You are requested to E Mail updated Resume with following details

  • Current Location
  • Pl. Confirm you are ready to work in Mumbai / Navi Mumbai
  • Gender : Male / Female
  • Total experience in Mass Manufacturing & Assembly of Precision functional products (In years)
  • Relevant experience of implementing & maintaining manufacturing operation sequences, manufacturing processes , production improvements, in cycle time, waste reduction, defect reduction & productivity & Process Quality. (In years)
  • Have you handled Manufacturing assembly of High/Medium Volume & High Mix business in rotating shift duties?
  • Can you solve & Trouble shoot manufacturing problems by using Root Cause Analysis (RCA) , PDCA cycle and the 5S methods , Six Sigma & Overall Equipment Effectiveness (OEE) ?
  • Are you aware of ISO procedures & ISO documentation
  • Do you know Shift-wise clearance of scrap (RCCM with Correct Root Cause)?
  • Are you aware of Visual management boards – Safety, Quality, Delivery, Inventory, and Productivity (SQDIP)?
  • Do you have Knowledge on Lean manufacturing systems (5S implementation, Standard work, Line balancing, SPC, VSM , SMED , FMEA’s & KANBAN ?
  • Monthly/Weekly scrap analysis & actions to be identified along with Process Quality.
  • Can you do the manpower planning (daily, weekly, monthly)?
  • Are you ready to work in Shifts ?
  • No of persons controlled (Skilled & Unskilled) per shift
  • Current Salary (Fixed + Variable )
  • Expected Salary
  • Minimum period required for Joining
  • Contact Details, Residence & Mobile No.
  • Age / Birth date
  • Skype ID/ WhatsApp No.

In case you are not interested, we will appreciate, if you can refer us, suitable matching profiles from your rich contacts.

title: BD Head
companyName: Intellectual Capital Hr Consulting Pvt Ltd
jobDescription:
Role & responsibilities


JOB DESCRIPTION & DESIGNATION: Business development Head


Total Experience: 10+ Years Relevant


Experience: Min 10 years


Qualification:


Bachelor's degree in

Finance, Business

Administration, Real

Estate, or a related

field. MBA or

equivalent

preferred.


Industry:


Experience in

business

development and

sales roles within

the finance

industry

Location: Prabhadevi Travel : Yes


Skills

/Competencies


•

• Track record of successfully structuring and

executing transactions involving private equity,

NBFCs, banking institutions, and structured

debt/equity funds.

• Exceptional networking and relationship-building

skills, coupled with the ability to establish

rapport and credibility with diverse stakeholders.

• Sound understanding of regulatory frameworks

governing real estate finance in India,

particularly in the MMR region.

• Excellent communication skills, both verbal and

written, with the capacity to articulate complex

concepts clearly and persuasively.

• Public Speaking, Negotiation skill, Team leading.


Responsibilities

once joined:

•

1. Identify and engage potential real estate developers

and land developers in MMR, understanding their

financial requirements and offering tailored solutions to

address their needs.

2. Foster and nurture strong relationships with

developers, Channel partners, (like financial

consulting, brokers, architects, etc.)

3. Lead the negotiation and structuring of financial

transactions, ensuring alignment with project

requirements and the company's financial objectives.

4. Collaborate cross-functionally with internal teams

including finance, credit, legal, and operations to

ensure seamless execution of transactions and

compliance with regulatory standards.

5. Stay updated on market trends, competitor

activities, and regulatory changes impacting the real

estate finance landscape in Mumbai & Navi Mumbai,

providing strategic insights to senior management.

6. Drive revenue growth by achieving or surpassing

sales targets, while upholding profitability and risk

management standards.

7. Actively participate in industry events, conferences,

and networking opportunities to enhance the

company's brand presence and expand its market

reach within the real estate finance sector.

8. Provide regular reports and updates on business

development activities, pipeline progress, and market


intelligence to senior leadership.

9. Mentoring and leading the team assigned and taking

all the steps to ensure divisional targets are met.


Past

Experience:


• Minimum of 10 years of proven experience in

business development or sales roles within the

real estate finance industry, with a strong grasp

of financial products and services relevant to

real estate development projects.

title: Senior Mobile Engineer (iOS)
jobDescription:
• We are looking for an experienced Software Engineer to join our iOS Engineering team.
  • You will be responsible for building new features for our customer facing apps
What you ll do
  • Translate designs and wireframes into high quality and performant iOS apps
  • Engineer responsive, maintainable and performant apps
  • Make technology choices and follow modern development practices
  • Set and maintain high standards of development practices and help the team adopt them
  • Commitment to collaborative problem solving, sophisticated design, and quality product is important
Qualifications
  • Master s or Bachelor s Degree in Computer Science/Engineering or equivalent
  • 5 years experience building iOS apps
  • Proficient in Swift / Objective C.
  • Experience with iOS frameworks such as Core Data, Core Animation, etc.
  • Experience with offline storage, threading, and performance tuning
  • Experience with RESTful APIs, Location APIs, Realm, SQLite or iOS SDK, Local storage, Camera, GeoLocation tracking, Social Authentications, etc.
  • Familiarity with cloud message APIs and push notifications
  • Understanding of Apple s design principles and interface guidelines
  • Ability to understand business requirements and translate them into technical requirements
  • A knack for benchmarking and optimization
  • Experience working in an Agile environment and working with a geographically distributed team
